info: T means true, F means False. If no publications, just leave the publication structure unchanged.
name: TANAKA, Masakazu

publications.text: (anthor)Patrons, Devotees and Goddesses: Ritual and Politics among the Tamil Fishemen of Sri Lanka. 1997 Manohar(Delhi)

8article) Religion in Everyday Life In Veena Das (ed.) The Oxford India Companion to Sociology and Anthropology. Oxford University Press, 2004..
